Overland_Park.Waldo Water Tower (Kansas City, Missouri:
Waldo is a neighborhood located in south Kansas City, Missouri that has continued to maintain its own unique character, even though it was annexed by Kansas City in 1909. Waldo's boundaries are Gregory Boulevard on the north to 91st Street on the south (although 89th street forms a full south boundary), and Holmes Road on the east to State Line Road on the west.
